@graph.name: Embrace
@graph.description: Creative interaction and guidance that empowers active change

@graph.name: Innovate
@graph.description: The space for adjacent connections where ideas flow, interact, evolve, grow and converge in novel ways.

@graph.name: Encourage
@graph.description: Augmentation informed by Innovation, enhanced with strong Intent, Ethics and Reflection

@graph.name: Team
@graph.description: We put a clear emphasis on self-managing teams that are empowered to make their own decisions

@graph.name: Domain
@graph.description: We Entitle our Team and our customers. Propose new initiatives for our Portfolio. Acquire data to explore Insights

@graph.name: Relate
@graph.description: Gaining Insight to articulate an ethical Vision for defining a Strategy to learn about our Market and ourselves.

@graph.name: Adapt
@graph.description: Feature Status is traced and linked to Components and Test criteria that Directs Technology activities

@graph.name: Tech
@graph.description: Components by UX, Service, Data and Cloud tiers. Support Data Science Models that are Interpreted in Benefit

@graph.name: Benefit
@graph.description: Interpret Discovery with Data Science. Establishes and Reviews with reference Design. Realizes Benefits.

@graph.name: Change
@graph.description: Assesses impacts. Proves Components to continuously Deploy by transforming changes into evolutionary architecture.

@graph.name: Deliver
@graph.description: Delivers product via a Secured cloud Network with Support and simulation.

@graph.name: Govern
@graph.description: Enables careful Advice for Maturity, Assets and with the intent of being a positive influence on society.
